TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_qqaya_na_ptasan, title = qqaya_na_ptasan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/qqaya_na_ptasan} }

S.FORM: == qqaya na ptasan == qqaya na ptasan qaniy ga, sazing tuqiy nya: qutux ga "atuk" son nha, piyux rom kinnalay na l'un psqungun mhul, shap squ lbit na hi; qutux loziy ga, "ttucing" son nha, stucing atuk smi bagah iluh memaw msramu, nanu siki mincyugal ini ga minpayat qmamas ru tmucing lga blaq balay qu pintasan nya.

== qqaya na ptasan == qqaya na ptasan qaniy ga, sazing toqiy nya: qotox ga "atok" son nha, piyox rom kinnalay na l'on psqongon mhol, shap sqo lbit na hi; qotox loziy ga, "ttocing" son nha, stocing atok smi bagah iloh memaw msramo, nano siki mincyogal ini ga minpayat qmamas ro tmocing lga blaq balay qo pintasan nya.
